borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions:
<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">All hard and soft landscape works shall
be carried out in accordance with the&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">approved details and to a reasonable
standard in accordance with the relevant&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">recommendations of appropriate British
Standards or other recognised Codes of</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Good Practice.&nbsp;The works shall be carried out prior to the
occupation of any part&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">of the development or in accordance
with the timetable agreed with the Local&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Planning Authority.</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">&nbsp; </span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Any trees or plants that, within a period of
five years after</span></p><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">planting, are removed, die or become, in
the opinion of the Local Planning&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Authority, seriously damaged or
defective, shall be replaced as soon as is&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">reasonably practicable with others of species,
size and number as originally&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">approved, unless the Local Planning
Authority gives its written consent to any&nbsp;</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">variation.&nbsp;</span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom:0cm;line-height:normal"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">No above ground works
shall start on site until full details of both hard and soft landscape
proposals (to the front and rear of the application site) are submitted to and
approved by the Local Planning Authority.&nbsp; These details shall include, as
appropriate:</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></p><ul><li style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">C</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; text-indent: -18pt;">ar parking layouts</span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="text-indent: -18pt;">Other vehicle and pedestrian access and circulation
areas</span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="text-indent: -18pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Hard surfacing materials proposed to be used</span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; text-indent: -18pt;">Minor artefacts and structures (eg cycle storage,
refuse or other storage units, signs, lighting)</span></li></ul><p class="MsoNormal" style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Soft landscape
details shall include: </span><span style="font-family:&quot;Arial&quot;,sans-serif;
mso-fareast-font-family:&quot;Times New Roman&quot;;mso-fareast-language:EN-GB"><o:p></o:p></span></p>





<ul><li style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;">Planting plans</li><li style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Written
specifications (including cultivation and other operations associated with
plant and grass establishment)</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Schedules of plants,
noting species, planting sizes and proposed numbers / densities where
appropriate</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></li><li style="margin-bottom: 0cm; line-height: normal;"><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif;">Implementation timetables.&nbsp;</span><span style="font-size: 10.5pt; font-family: &quot;PT Sans&quot;, sans-serif;"><o:p></o:p></span></li></ul>

<p>The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><ul><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Existing and proposed site/ block plan - Drawing No. A_35CR_EX_FP5_001A - Dated 08.02.2023</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed ground floor plan - Drawing No.&nbsp;A_35CR_PR_FP5_200B - Dated 08.02.2023</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed first floor plan - Drawing No.&nbsp;A_35CR_PR_FP5_201B&nbsp;- Dated 08.02.2023</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed roof plan - Drawing No.&nbsp;A_35CR_PR_FP5_202B - Dated 08.02.2023</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed elevations - Drawing No.&nbsp;A_35CR_PR_FP5_203B - Dated 08.02.2023</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed elevations - Drawing No.&nbsp;A_35CR_PR_FP5_204B - Dated 08.02.2023</span></li><li><span style="font-size:11pt">Drawing title: Proposed elevations - Drawing No.&nbsp;A_35CR_PR_FP5_205B&nbsp;- Dated 08.02.2023</span></li></ul><p>No other drawings or documents apply.</p>
The development shall be constructed in accordance with the external materials shown on DRAWING NO. XXX and to the satisfaction of the Local Planning Authority.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Demolition of existing garage and shed and construction of a new two storey 2x bedroom dwelling adjacent to 35 Clementhorpe Road

constraints_details.result: 35 Clementhorpe Road, Dagenham, Barking And Dagenham, RM9 4BJ
